about_the_game:
Remind yourself of the good time you had with Cherry, Purin and Puff with the opening song and BGMs of the game Fluffy Store!
As an Easter egg, try clicking the 3 kemomimis and see what will happen~

This DLC contains:
✿ Embedded music player where you can interact with the 3 kemomimis while listening to the tunes.
✿ Cute emojis.
✿ Full HD wallpapers in ultra quality.
✿ OST composed by project lights that contains:
Theme Songs——
『Intersect World』
『Intersect World - Short ver』
BGM——
『Welcome to Fluffy Store』
『Four Friends' Home』
『Ordinary Daily Life』
『Twilight』
『Hotcakes』
『Passionate Days』
『Cheers to Unforgettable Memories』
『Darkness in Hearts』

How to use:
After purchasing, click “EXTRA” in the main menu of the game to enter the music player.
Also, you can find all the content in the “ListeningWithYou” folder in the install folder of the game.
